com.cognifide.qa.bb.aem.expectedconditions

Class SidekickActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cognifide.qa.bb.aem.expectedconditions.SidekickActions

  • public final class SidekickActions
extends Object
    Static methods that provides actions on Sidekick wrapped in ExpectedCondition.
